word: Elder Butler and Elder Smith are men who, had they been where God would have had them, would have stood by my side to help me in place of hindering me in the work which the Lord has given me to do. Those who have not had the experience and the light that these men have had are only accountable for the light which God has given them.--Letter 60, 1890, p. 1. (To Brother Colcord, March 10, 1890.)
